backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user streak data with access control, allowing users or admins to record daily completions and computing streak updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing pronunciation-related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of key frontend pronunciation and language‑learning related files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file providing the root element and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling navigation between the home page and language learning page with theming support.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing navigation controls, branding, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper applying background texture, overlay, and centered content region.
frontend/src/components/CompleteSectionB: Button that records lesson section completion using authenticated identity and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown component for selecting a learning language from the supported list.
frontend/src/components/LessonSectionNav: Tab-based navigation for switching between lesson sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PronunciationCon: Button control for playing or stopping text-to-speech pronunciation with error feedback.
frontend/src/components/StreakPanel.tsx: React component that displays the user’s daily streak, best streak, and last completion date using streak query data.
frontend/src/data/lessonsSeed.ts: Defines lesson content structures and provides seeded English lesson data across multiple categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching streak data and recording daily completions with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Hook wrapping browser speech synthesis with language selection, status tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base font settings.
frontend/src/lib/languages.ts: Exports a list of supported languages with codes, English names, and native names.
frontend/src/lib/lessonContent.ts: Retrieves lesson content for a given language and section, falling back to default messages when missing.
frontend/src/lib/lessonStructure.ts: Defines the LessonSection interface and a list of five predefined lesson sections used throughout the app.
frontend/src/lib/localDate.ts: Provides utilities to get the current local date as YYYYMMDD and format streak dates into readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/speechSynthesisLanguage: Maps internal language codes to BCP‑47 tags for Web Speech API pronunciation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a grid of selectable languages and app branding.
Displays lessons for a selected language with navigation, content rendering, and pronunciation controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s metadata, features, architecture notes, and versioned state.
